languages.text: "Казнить они не брезгуют, но разве это наказание? Лучше бы вернули публичные пытки, вот было бы дело!"
"They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"
languages.original_text: "Казнить они не брезгуют, но разве это наказание? Лучше бы вернули публичные пытки, вот было бы дело!"

traits.locale_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture, that would be exciting!"
"They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be exciting!"
"They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be exciting!"
"They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"
"They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

languages.text: "Sie scheuen sich nicht, jemanden zu exekutieren, aber das ist doch keine Strafe. Ich sehne mich nach der öffentlichen Folter zurück. Das wäre ein Anblick für meine müden Augen!"
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie scheuen sich nicht, jemanden zu exekutieren, aber das ist doch keine Strafe. Ich sehne mich nach der öffentlichen Folter zurück. Das wäre ein Anblick für meine müden Augen!"

languages.text: « Ils n'hésitent pas à exécuter les condamnés, mais ce genre de châtiment n'est pas à mon goût. Je préférerais qu'ils réinstaurent la torture publique. Ça, ce serait un spectacle réjouissant ! »
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils n'hésitent pas à exécuter les condamnés, mais ce genre de châtiment n'est pas à mon goût. Je préférerais qu'ils réinstaurent la torture publique. Ça, ce serait un spectacle réjouissant ! »

languages.text: “他们并不反对死刑，可死刑哪里算得上惩罚？我真希望能恢复公开酷刑的做法，那才叫赏心悦目呢！”
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: “他们并不反对死刑，可死刑哪里算得上惩罚？我真希望能恢复公开酷刑的做法，那才叫赏心悦目呢！”

languages.text: «Es cierto que no rehúyen la ejecución, pero ¿qué castigo es ese? Podrían reinstaurar la tortura en público. ¡Eso sí que era un espectáculo!».
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto que no rehúyen la ejecución, pero ¿qué castigo es ese? Podrían reinstaurar la tortura en público. ¡Eso sí que era un espectáculo!».

languages.text: 「処刑をためらうことはないが、それがどんな罰になる？公開拷問を復活させてほしいものだ。きっと見応えがあるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: 「処刑をためらうことはないが、それがどんな罰になる？公開拷問を復活させてほしいものだ。きっと見応えがあるぞ！」

languages.text: "İdamdan çekinmiyorlar da bu nasıl ceza? Keşke halka açık işkence geri gelse. Gözlerimizin pası silinirdi!"
languages.original_text: "They do not shy away from execution, but what kind of punishment is that? I wish they would bring back public torture. That would be a sight for sore eyes!"

traits.locale_text: "İdamdan çekinmezler ama bu nasıl ceza? Keşke halka açık işkence geri gelse. Gözlerimizin pası silinirdi!"
